hero-section.title: OWN HOME
hero-section.tailored: Tailored financing to suit your needs

how-it-works-section.title: How does it work?
how-it-works-section.step-1: How do I sell my house?

sell-house-dialog.title: Sell ​​your property with Argatio
sell-house-dialog.subtitle: Enjoy the benefits of Tokenization
sell-house-dialog.text-section-1: We divide the value of your property into stakes that can be purchased by different people.
sell-house-dialog.text-section-2: We offer these portions to our network of investors, who can acquire a stake in the property.
sell-house-dialog.text-section-3: Once all the property stakes are acquired, Argatio buys your property, guaranteeing you a complete and secure sale.
sell-house-dialog.text-section-4: We use blockchain technology for a transparent and secure transaction.

text-section-5.text: We also offer the property to potential tenants through our leasing model, where they can gradually purchase stakes until they become full owners.

sell-house-dialog.text-section-6: Sign Up and we will answer all your questions

how-it-works-section.step-2: How do I buy my house?

buy-house-dialog.title: Buy a property with Argatio
buy-house-dialog.subtitle: Become an owner
buy-house-dialog.text-section-1: Browse our catalog of available properties and choose the one that best fits your needs and budget.
buy-house-dialog.text-section-2: You can also propose a property that is for sale and that you wish to buy using our method, and we will contact the owner.
buy-house-dialog.text-section-3: The value of the property you choose is divided into stakes that you can buy gradually.
buy-house-dialog.text-section-4: When you have purchased all the stakes in the property, you become the total owner of the house.
buy-house-dialog.text-section-5: We use blockchain technology for a transparent and secure transaction.
buy-house-dialog.text-section-6: Sign Up and we will answer all your questions
buy-house-dialog.button: I want to be an owner

how-it-works-section.step-3: How do I buy the house I rent?

buy-rent-house-dialog.title: Buy the house you rent with Argatio
buy-rent-house-dialog.subtitle: From tenant to owner

text-section-1.text-1: Make sure that the property you are renting is available for sale.
text-section-1.text-2: It may already be listed with Argatio; if not, we will contact the property owner to explain the process.

buy-rent-house-dialog.text-section-2: The value of the property you choose is divided into stakes that you can buy gradually.
buy-rent-house-dialog.text-section-3: When you have purchased all the stakes in the property, you become the total owner of the house.
buy-rent-house-dialog.text-section-4: We use blockchain technology for a transparent and secure transaction.
buy-rent-house-dialog.text-section-5: Sign Up and we will answer all your questions

how-it-works-section.step-4: How to buy the premises I rent?

buy-rent-local-dialog.title: Buy the premises you rent with Argatio
buy-rent-local-dialog.subtitle: From tenant to owner

text-section-1.text-1: Make sure that the property you are renting is available for sale.

buy-rent-local-dialog.text-section-2: The value of the property you choose is divided into stakes that you can buy gradually.
buy-rent-local-dialog.text-section-3: When you have purchased all the stakes in the property, you become the total owner of the house.
buy-rent-local-dialog.text-section-4: We use blockchain technology for a transparent and secure transaction.
